content.d: Ahhhh, I can’t find our secret weapon!!
Secret weapon?
Yes! I was preparing a secret weapon to surprise everyone who’s coming...
You were preparing something like that!?
You should have discussed it with us. Keeping it to yourself is kind of cold.
Ehehe... I wanted to surprise you guys too!
Losing it before you use it... We can’t even help search for it now.
Ugh, I’m sorry!
When was the last time you saw this secret weapon?
If we retrace your steps from your memory, we’ll surely find it!
Like a detective, nya~!
Let’s see... I think...
Honokaaaaa!
What on earth have you forgotten now!?
Ah, Kotori-chan, Umi-chan. You’re late.
What have I forgotten?
Umm... Uhh... That! It’s that, Honoka-chan!
Is it something that all the second years were preparing?
Eh!? Umm...
The secret weapon.
Why that!?
Ehehe... Sorry! I let it slip! But I’m glad we found it~!
“Glad” is not the right word hereeeee!!!
